critique: The document primarily conveys a sense of concern and determination to address gun violence. There's an element of acknowledging past failures and highlighting progress made, but the overall tone is serious and focused on future action. Joy is not present. Sadness is present due to the discussion of homicides and school shootings. Anger is present due to the mention of bump stocks. Fear is present due to the discussion of gun violence. Disgust is present due to the discussion of gun violence. Surprise is not present.
